abstract: Heidi Nelson Cruz has proved vital support to her husband Ted Cruz in his 2016 presidential bid, serving as strategist, fund-raiser and public relations face; Mrs Cruz's past financial career, which she abandoned in order to better support her husband's ambitions, has proved useful in coaxing funds from well-heeled donors.
